nachoSupreme.description: Home made Tortilla Chips topped off with fresh Nacho Cheese, Sour Cream, Guacamole finished off with freshly made Pico De Gallo.

quesadilla.description: Beef Fajitas topped with Cheese, Sour Cream, in a Home Made Tortilla with Pico De Gallo and Guacamole on the side.

chickenSalad.description: Sweet and tasty Chicken Salad Sandwich made with Ranch dressing.

muffuletta.description: Muffuletta, which originated in New Orleans, is named after the round, crusty Sicilian loaf of bread it's traditionally served on. While I favor my own olive salad, there are several good versions available in most supermarkets. â€”Lou Sansevero, Ferron, Utah

spicyChipotle.description: Spicy Southwest Chipotle sandwich is a delight on the taste buds. It will hit you with the taste of Avocados and Chicken along with the feirce home made Hot Sauce.

hangerStake.description: A thick slab of grilled hanger steak makes this sandwich into a full meal. Add some marinated red onions for a nice little tang.

volcanoChocolateCake.desctiption: A Chocolate Volcano filled with vanilla Ice Cream and topped off with a Chocolate Shell

flan.desctiption: A baked custart. It is a rich, thick custard custard made with eggs, sugar, milk, whipping cream, a little vanilla and sugar that is caramelized for the top.

lemonade.desctiption: Refreshing Lemonade made fresh every morning.

iceTea.desctiption: One of a kind Home made Tea.
